id="-NdCDYU-WVwAaS0uV99Z-4" value="<font style="font-size: 10px;">Views their tasks,&nbsp;</font><div style="font-size: 10px;"><font style="font-size: 10px;">adds new tasks,&nbsp;</font></div><div id="-NdCDYU-WVwAaS0uV99Z-8" value="<span style="font-size: 10px;">Gets the tasks from&nbsp;</span><div><span style="font-size: 10px;">and adds/removes/changes&nbsp;</span><div><span style="font-size: div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 8px;
font-size: 8px;

div.font: A user who wants to add to do tasks and mark them as complete

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 265px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 8px;
font-size: 8px;

div.span: Allows users to view, add and remove tasks and mark them as completed

div.span: Manages user requests and template rendering
